source_identity.book_title: Liste nominative des habitants de la commune de La Ciotat

2.payroll_note: The information "domestique" is placed originally in the source in between the two columns "role in household" and "profession".

4.payroll_note: "Garçon charcutier" is written between the columns "role in household" and "profession". I decided to insert this information to both cells as it defines both of them.
